11.20.18  9:44 am   stuff is things?

     yes

11.20.18  9:07 am   I can't live without food... theres something wrong with me?

     yes but also everyone else

11.20.18  8:40 am   why is the misspelled q in ueqstions color GrEeN

     due to rebelliousness

11.20.18  8:33 am   what is considered inside, do you need to be totally enclosed (4 walls and a roof) or just four walls? is the roof necessary?

     no

11.20.18  7:55 am   should I learn how to edit?

     sure

11.20.18  2:50 am   Why did you start making songs?

     because songs are powerful

11.20.18  2:43 am   does the past make the future more interesting or does the future make the past more interesting?

     both for sure

11.20.18  12:07 am   how do you decide if a lyric is good or not

     put it to music!

11.19.18  9:54 pm   What do you think about yourself?

     aaaah, etc

11.19.18  9:12 pm   is it so immoral to appreciate male beauty?

     i doubt it

11.19.18  9:02 pm   IM A GODDAMN FUXKING ALIVE AND I CANT EVEN EXPRESS HOW GREAT THIS IS!  I CAN DO WHATEVRR I WANT RIGHT NOW!

     ah, #relatable

11.19.18  8:53 pm   Can you please release a music video for I guess I got to listen to bob marley on your yt 

     that would be nice but i wish the recording/arrangement was a little better

11.19.18  8:34 pm   In 2019 is your website gonna stay the same? Different layout? Im curious

     each time i add a category, the other categories are usually adjusted slightly to make everything fit better. other than that there is usually no change, and if there is it would never be linked to the new year

11.19.18  8:23 pm   i'm working myself too hard because my friends have really serious situations they are dealing with and i need to help them. i am starting to be more incompetent than useful because I'm so tired and i'm definitely not able to accomplish my own personal goals with this level of stress. but i fundamentally need to help my friends because i can. but maybe i can't. but i still need to try. but i might be more harm than good because i don't have all the skills necessary to help. WHAT DO I DO!?

     dial it back just a couple of clicks

11.19.18  8:08 pm   Do you question all answers?

     only some of them

11.19.18  7:32 pm   when was time made and why

     about 14 billion years ago, for experimental reasons

11.19.18  7:28 pm   I like  your music but do you make music videos? - Toriel

     yes

11.19.18  7:25 pm   will you ever do a interview

     i am doing one next week, in addition to this one on this page which i have been doing for 3 years

11.19.18  7:01 pm   In "long long long journey", Triangle Boy relates to the paintings, even though MOST of them are painted by somebody else. So which of the paintings are the original Triangle Boy� creations among the other artists' works?

     i assume the blank one

11.19.18  6:24 pm   Do you think that we all should get along?

     hopefully something a little more interesting

11.19.18  5:52 pm   would you ever consider a one man show?

     sure

      if so, how'd you pull it off?

     a microphone, and some type of chordal instrument, such as a piano keyboard or acoustic guitar

11.19.18  5:50 pm   In terms of vocal harmony, I think I can make a 3 part harmony. But what about 4, or 5 part harmony? How do I create does extra parts. Do I just duplicate a part and put it an octave lower or higher? 

     the best way to figure out what you're doing is spend some time with the piano keyboard. that way you can try it all out and see what you like. don't try to add more parts just because you want to say there's more parts. only do it if you wanna hear them

11.19.18  5:17 pm   Have you ever completely lost the joy of making music?

     no

     This has happened to me with writing, and I am very worried and not sure what to do. 

     go on a journey

11.19.18  5:11 pm   Have you ever done an Am F C G song?

     maybe but i'm not sure

11.19.18  4:40 pm   give us a hint for the password in the reality section

     there is no password

11.19.18  4:27 pm   What is the first letter of the next song?

     i can't tell you

11.19.18  4:23 pm   hey bill are you gonna change your website layout? if you say no, i'm fine not big deal actually. 

     the changes usually occur when i add something. the existing things sometimes get adjusted to make room

11.19.18  4:11 pm   how long is the next music video?

     possibly 2:18

     i read someone's question and you said that one is about stars and miracles,

     no i didn't

     so i'm thinking "the miracle star" is that close enough?

     not really

11.19.18  3:47 pm   did you come back home two days ago?

     yes

11.19.18  3:20 pm   Are there any instruments you wish to learn in the future?

     yes

11.19.18  2:36 pm   How can I look as good in a hoodie as you do

     try different ones, sometimes certain ones fit better. another good way is to do 10 takes and only use the best one

11.19.18  2:13 pm   what's the best song/video you've ever made in your opinion?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.19.18  1:36 pm   How long does it take for you to come up with the general premise for a song?

     it happens instantly but i dunno if you wanna count the time spent waiting for it

11.19.18  1:10 pm   I just noticed in the your song hallelujah, you talk about finding a way and such and right after that video you made your brand new schedule. Was it a prophecy all along?

     hallelujah was written 2 years earlier. but it surely was a prophecy for not only that but for everything else i would do after that point and everything else i may do in the future

11.19.18  12:20 pm   what website maker did you use to m ake this?

     text edit

11.19.18  12:17 pm   what do you think of goats

     100 stars

11.19.18  12:05 pm   How do you get over writer's block without getting frustrating and bagging your head against the wall?

     try banging your head around the wall

11.19.18  11:23 am   bill, most of your tshirts are sold out. can you make more?

     i'm the one who designed them, but i am not the one who makes them. if you click one of the links on the side you should see an email contact for the company who makes them.... here i just found it, it's hello@dftba.com

11.19.18  11:19 am   Do you have a music degree? (sorry if this is too personal)

     not even close

11.19.18  10:08 am   how roughly long does it take you to make one of your videos?

     longer than i wish

11.19.18  9:34 am   do you use any exotic scales on your songs?

     you'll have to listen and see

11.19.18  9:18 am   Hello I really like pie but can't find any. what do I do?

     make your own!

11.19.18  7:42 am   hi bill, i've been playing solo and mainly classical piano for some time. i now want to play in a band, or with other people etc. my guitarist friends just look at a chord sheet and start playing together easily, without working on any arrangements beforehand, i want to do that, how do i do that

     you'll have to learn what the chords mean. i'll try to get you started .... if you see "C" that means C major which means notes C, E, and G all at the same time in whatever configuration you think sounds the best at the time

11.19.18  6:50 am   what do you remember

     the previous question

11.19.18  6:47 am   how to be more confident

     walk forward

11.19.18  5:43 am   can you give us the title of the next song, but scrambled?

     hint: stars, miracles

11.19.18  4:07 am   Have you written and uploaded a song that has a key change in it?

     i think most of my songs have key changes somewhere

     Like when a song starts off in the key of G, than later on, after the bridge and solo, for instance, the song then changes to key of A.

     not sure if i've done it exactly that way, but maybe the closest thing to what you are talking about would be 'we could just get high' because it changes keys for the last chorus. but it also changes keys for the 2nd chorus. and the 1st

      It's kind of a refreshing type feeling I get when I hear key changes in songs.

11.19.18  3:46 am   Hi. What does the squirrels say in hello sexy pants? I can't understand the whispers.

     likely a paraphrasing of the previous line

11.19.18  12:01 am   what is your opinion on the plural form of the word "octopus," which is "octopodes."

     i am skeptical

11.18.18  11:40 pm   your videos, besides being very great as a whole, contain little tiny moments that are just overwhelmingly pleasing. each one seems to have at least one couple-second section that just tickles my brain perfectly. sometimes it's a lyric, like "i'm going to hell, and i'm late for it" or "too small for the mall", sometimes it's musical, like the deceptive cadence in the final chorus of long long long journey, or the keyboard fill in the day goes on (during the salmon count), and sometimes it's part a part of the animation, like damien maymdien's hands when he says "i've heard it a hundred times" in maybe i could eat blades of grass.

i guess my question is: do you ever have specific little moments in your videos that you're extra proud of, independent of the content as a whole? 

     i felt good about the under score to 'monday salamander trivia' and i felt good about the chords in the 'new arrivals' jingle from history of the world
